entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
